Title: Evolus
Business: We are a medical aesthetics company focused on providing physicians and their patients with expanded choices in aesthetic procedures and treatments. We focus on the self-pay aesthetic market and our first product candidate, PrabotulinumtoxinA (DWP-450), is an injectable 900 kilodalton, or kDa, botulinum toxin type A complex designed to address the needs of the large and growing facial aesthetics market.
